text: Televisión Universidad de Concepción, TVU, is a television channel of Chile. It currently airs in Concepción on VHF channel 11. Its headquarters are in Concepción, Chile, in the Universidad de Concepción. TVU mostly aired documentaries and some low budget entertainment television shows. Due To Low Rateings, Will TVU Shutdown in 2021. TVU Category:Spanish-language television stations Category:Television channels and stations established in 1997 Category:Mass media in Concepción, Chile
title: TVU (Chilean TV channel)
